data.title: THOMAS LOUGH
data.meta_description: Thomas Lough, 51, resident of Wheeling, WV, died Sunday, April 24, 2022 at Ruby Memorial Hospital, Morgantown, WV. He was born in Wheeling on March 10, 1971, son of Donald and Delores Boring Lough. Tom worked in Landscaping and Lawn Care, was Catholic by faith and a member of the Lansing Sportsman Club. He was […]
data.text:
He was born in Wheeling on March 10, 1971, son of Donald and Delores Boring Lough.

Tom worked in Landscaping and Lawn Care, was Catholic by faith and a member of the Lansing Sportsman Club. He was an avid outdoorsman and was very hard working. He loved his family very much.

He was preceded in death by his brother, John Lough.

Tom is survived by his wife of 26 years, Mary Galliher Lough; son, Thomas Ray Lough; sister, Aimee Lough; brother, Donald Lough, Jr; several nieces and nephews.

Friends will be received on Thursday, April 28, 2022 from 2-7 pm at Kepner Funeral Home, Burke Chapel, 2101 Warwood Avenue, Wheeling, WV 26003 (304-277-2722).

Mass of Christian Burial will be held on Friday, April 29, 2022 at 11 am at the Bishop’s Chapel at Mt. Calvary Cemetery, Wheeling.

Interment will be at the convenience of the family at Mt. Calvary Cemetery.
